Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
FullTitle: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (2003)
Plot: The final confrontation between the forces of good and evil fighting for control of the future of Middle-earth. Frodo and Sam reach Mordor in their quest to destroy the One Ring, while Aragorn leads the forces of good against Sauron's evil army at the stone city of Minas Tirith.
Awards: Top Rated Movies #7 | Won 11 Oscars. Another 198 wins & 124 nominations.
Writers: J.R.R. Tolkien, Fran Walsh, Philippa Boyens, Peter Jackson
Stars: Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom
Companies: New Line Cinema, WingNut Films, The Saul Zaentz Company
Tagline: There can be no triumph without loss. No victory without suffering. No freedom without sacrifice.

Similars.Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Similars.FullTitle: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (2002)
Similars.Plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

Similars.Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

Similars.Stars: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom

Similars.Title: The Dark Knight

Similars.Title: Forrest Gump
Similars.Plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
Similars.Stars: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise

Similars.Title: Pulp Fiction

Similars.Stars: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson

Similars.Title: The Shawshank Redemption
